projects.title: Chronic Kidney Disease Prediction
projects.description: Developed a machine learning model to predict chronic kidney disease using patient health indicators. Achieved high accuracy through data preprocessing, feature selection, and model optimization.

projects.title: House Evaluation

projects.title: Power Outages Analysis
